description:
Watch out: The Fluffy Birds are around! 
This game is highly recommended to all fans of puzzle and match three games! 

MANY HOURS OF MATCH THREE PUZZLE FUN 
Fluffy Birds is cute, cuddly and easy to play. Shift and slide entire rows and columns to form groups of 3 or more like-colored birdies. 

THREE FLUFFY GAME MODES 
Try to collect all 12 eggs, and beat the timer in CASUAL mode. Sit back, relax and simply enjoy the Fluffy Birds in RELAXATION mode. Train your brain with 20 different puzzles in PUZZLE mode. 

FLUFFY FEATURES 
★ Many hours of match three and puzzle fun! 
★ 3 different game modes: Casual, Relaxation and Puzzle 
★ 20 different mind-bending puzzles 
★ Cute and cuddly artwork with HD display support 
★ Achievements 
★ Online leaderboards coming soon!
★ Interactive menus 

Become a fan of Fluffy Birds on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GameDuell.Mobile.Games
